The spouse raised from under the apple-tree, or, The way by which children of wrath come to be made the children of grace opening the doctrine of our redemption by the Lord Jesus Christ, both in respect to the purchase and application / by John Collings ... Collinges, John, 1623-1690.
[2], 83 p.
Printed for Rich. Tomlins ..., London : 1649.
Has special t.p. with imprint: London : Printed for Rich. Tomlins, 1649. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Marginal notes.
